metadata.title: CVE-2018-5817 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: A type confusion error within the "unpacked_load_raw()" function withinLibRaw versions prior to 0.19.1 (internal/dcraw_common.cpp) can beexploited to trigger an infinite loop.

criterions.comment: libraw: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
